summary: This is an email exchange between two individuals, one identified as an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, regarding a citecheck for a portion of a legal brief. The email discusses the progress of the task and logistical coordination.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the initial email requesting a citecheck for a portion of a legal brief, identifying themselves with their title and office address.

events.title: Citecheck Request and Progress Update
events.description: An email exchange regarding the progress of citechecking a portion of a legal brief, with an attachment of work completed through page 5.

locations.context: Office address of the Assistant United States Attorney, Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated October 27, 2021, concerning legal work on an unspecified brief.
One participant is an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The task involves citechecking, indicating ongoing legal preparation or review.
The correspondence is logistical, discussing progress and availability to complete the work.
The document originates from the Epstein case files (EFTA00017887), linking it to that investigation.
